string.name: stripe_card_scan_title
string.description: Text displayed above the scan window for paymentsheet, instructing the user how to scan card

resources.string: Position your card in the rectangle to scan

string.name: stripe_card_scan_instructions
string.description: Text displayed above the scan window, instructing the user how to scan card

string.name: stripe_card_scan_privacy_link_text
string.description: Privacy link text in scan window. THIS STRING SHOULD NOT BE MODIFIED

resources.string: We use Stripe to verify your card details. Stripe may use and store your data according its privacy policy. Learn more

string.name: stripe_camera_permission_settings_message
string.description: Message shown to the user when camera permission is denied in fragment

resources.string: Please allow camera access in settings to scan your card

string.name: stripe_close_button_description
string.description: Text used to close the scan window

string.name: stripe_torch_button_description
string.description: Text used to turn on the camera torch

string.name: stripe_swap_camera_button_description
string.description: Text used to swap the camera
